title: Preference strength
description: Quick calibrators about what you prefer right now. These gently tilt your archetype balance; there are no right answers.

questions.text: Small rituals (a phrase, breath, or token) meaningfully change my headspace.
questions.question_text: Small rituals (a phrase, breath, or token) meaningfully change my headspace.

questions.text: Playful dares and mini-games quickly spark my energy.
questions.question_text: Playful dares and mini-games quickly spark my energy.

questions.text: Presentation and finesse (music, lighting, pacing) matter as much as the activity.
questions.question_text: Presentation and finesse (music, lighting, pacing) matter as much as the activity.

questions.text: Trying small, new twists excites me more than repeating the exact same script.
questions.question_text: Trying small, new twists excites me more than repeating the exact same script.

questions.text: Predictable rhythms and clear expectations help me relax into connection.
questions.question_text: Predictable rhythms and clear expectations help me relax into connection.

questions.text: Talking about meaning (what we want to feel and why) deepens my desire.
questions.question_text: Talking about meaning (what we want to feel and why) deepens my desire.

questions.text: Clear invitations and decisive calls feel kinder than prolonged ambiguity.
questions.question_text: Clear invitations and decisive calls feel kinder than prolonged ambiguity.

questions.text: How much do you want ritual and symbolism in your connection right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want ritual and symbolism in your connection right now?

questions.text: How much do you want playful tension and pattern-breaking right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want playful tension and pattern-breaking right now?

questions.text: How much do you want polish and sensory finesse right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want polish and sensory finesse right now?

questions.text: How much do you want novelty and discovery right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want novelty and discovery right now?

questions.text: How much do you want routine and steady rhythms right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want routine and steady rhythms right now?

questions.text: How much do you want clarity and meaning-making right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want clarity and meaning-making right now?

questions.text: How much do you want clear guardrails and leadership right now?
questions.question_text: How much do you want clear guardrails and leadership right now?

questions.text: Begin–middle–end structure helps me enter, deepen, and land experiences.
questions.question_text: Begin–middle–end structure helps me enter, deepen, and land experiences.

questions.text: Symbolic marking (phrases, tokens, gestures) makes connection feel anchored for me.
questions.question_text: Symbolic marking (phrases, tokens, gestures) makes connection feel anchored for me.

questions.text: Quick resets (90-second games, playful dares) help me bounce back when energy dips.
questions.question_text: Quick resets (90-second games, playful dares) help me bounce back when energy dips.

questions.text: I enjoy teasing and pattern-breaking when safety is clearly named and signals are crisp.
questions.question_text: I enjoy teasing and pattern-breaking when safety is clearly named and signals are crisp.

questions.text: Texture, symmetry, and staging meaningfully shape my experience of intimacy.
questions.question_text: Texture, symmetry, and staging meaningfully shape my experience of intimacy.

questions.text: I’d rather do fewer things with more finesse than more things with less polish.
questions.question_text: I’d rather do fewer things with more finesse than more things with less polish.

questions.text: A small dose of novelty most weeks keeps me energized and curious.
questions.question_text: A small dose of novelty most weeks keeps me energized and curious.

questions.text: I like rotating ‘same-but-fresh’ patterns instead of repeating a fixed script exactly.
questions.question_text: I like rotating ‘same-but-fresh’ patterns instead of repeating a fixed script exactly.

questions.text: Clear roles, rhythms, and small routines help me feel safe and present.
questions.question_text: Clear roles, rhythms, and small routines help me feel safe and present.

questions.text: Quiet co-regulation (water, warmth, a check-in) matters as much as the activity to me.
questions.question_text: Quiet co-regulation (water, warmth, a check-in) matters as much as the activity to me.

questions.text: I value being understood—sometimes as much as being agreed with—during hard moments.
questions.question_text: I value being understood—sometimes as much as being agreed with—during hard moments.

questions.text: Gentle, timely reflections (on request) help me orient and choose well in the moment.
questions.question_text: Gentle, timely reflections (on request) help me orient and choose well in the moment.

questions.text: I relax when boundaries, exits, and safety signals are explicit and close at hand.
questions.question_text: I relax when boundaries, exits, and safety signals are explicit and close at hand.

questions.text: Decisive pacing with short feedback loops works better for me than prolonged ambiguity.
questions.question_text: Decisive pacing with short feedback loops works better for me than prolonged ambiguity.
